tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE zone_activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  zone_id INT,
  activity_name VARCHAR(255),
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE protected_environment_zones (
	zone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	zone_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	boundaries GEOGRAPHY NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE zone_coordinates (
	coord_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	zone_id INT NOT NULL,
	latitude DECIMAL(10, 6) NOT NULL,
	longitude DECIMAL(10, 6) NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES protected_environment_zones(zone_id)
)

CREATE TABLE zone_activities (
	activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	zone_id INT NOT NULL,
	activity_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES protected_environment_zones(zone_id)
)

CREATE TABLE zone_visitors (
	visitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	zone_id INT NOT NULL,
	visitor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	visit_date DATE NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES protected_environment_zones(zone_id)
)

CREATE TABLE zone_restrictions (
	restriction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	zone_id INT NOT NULL,
	restriction_description TEXT NOT NULL,
	start_date DATE NOT NULL,
	end_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES protected_environment_zones(zone_id)
)
